items.sentence: It was so dark that I couldn\'t see anything.
I spent all yesterday working on that report.
I spoke to Tom about that just the other day.
Tom doesn\'t think he can do that by himself.
We\'ll do that later when we\'re not so busy.
I wondered what time the concert would begin.
I wondered whether Tom wanted to sing or not.
Tom explained to us why he couldn\'t do that.
I want to hear your version of what happened.
I want to speak to whoever is in charge here.
I want to talk to as many people as possible.
I want you to stay here and take care of Tom.
Have you finished reading today\'s paper yet?
I\'m disappointed that my friend isn\'t here.
Tom said I could wait here until he got back.
Tom said he could hear Mary and John arguing.
Is there anything else that you want to know?
It cost me 50 dollars to have my watch fixed.
It takes time to develop political awareness.
Tom and Mary said that they had a lot of fun.
